title: Card: grey image rounded
code:
<gds-card padding="s" variant="primary" border="primary" gap="l" color="primary" height="100%">
  <gds-img src="https://api.seb.io/components/image/img.jpg" border-radius="xs"></gds-img>

  <gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="l" padding="0 s">
    <gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="s">
      <gds-text tag="h3" font-size="heading-m">
        This is a heading
      </gds-text>
      <gds-text tag="p" font-size="body-m" text-wrap="pretty" width="90%">
        This is the body text. Please make it your own. You can use a button when that suites the context, or  seperate link. The heading can also be the link.
      </gds-text>
    </gds-flex>
    <gds-flex gap="s">
      <gds-button>
        Primary
      </gds-button>
      <gds-button rank="secondary">
        secondary
      </gds-button>
    </gds-flex>
</gds-card>
